tool_description: Classifies hair type using curl pattern, porosity, thickness, and other characteristics to determine the appropriate care category.

curl_pattern.description: Hair curl pattern: straight, wavy, curly, or kinky

porosity_level.description: Hair porosity: low, medium, or high

strand_thickness.description: Individual hair strand thickness: fine, medium, or thick

error_messages: Invalid curl pattern: Must be one of [straight, wavy, curly, kinky]
Invalid porosity level: Must be one of [low, medium, high]
Invalid strand thickness: Must be one of [fine, medium, thick]
Missing required parameter: All three parameters (curl_pattern, porosity_level, strand_thickness) must be provided
usage: Provide curl pattern, porosity level, and strand thickness to classify hair type. The tool returns a detailed hair type classification with care guidelines.

moisture_needs.description: Moisture requirement level: low, moderate, high, or intense

protein_sensitivity.description: Protein treatment sensitivity: low, moderate, or high
